brewery.brewery_description: HEY. Heyday likes to keep things fresh, colourful and seasonal opting to flex our creativity with new beers regularly.

beer.beer_name: White Star Jasmine Green Tea Kolsch

beer.beer_description: A classic IPA named after head brewer Ash's spirit animal, Snow Leopard brings a balanced hop trio of Centennial, Citra and Strata. Strong grapefruit and citrus flavours are paired with light floral notes and a crisp bitterness!

Our Munich Helles is crisp with subtle toastiness & pronounced malt aromas, offering a smooth & incredibly drinkable experience. Its layered complexity adds depth to each sip, perfectly balancing malt richness with a refreshing finish. Clean & satisfying, it's a lager that leaves a lasting impression.

Our Pacific Gose is a sparkling, tart German-style ale with a bold Pacific twist. Featuring hops from New Zealand & Australia, it bursts with zesty citrus, pine & floral notes, while the addition of salt & coriander creates a complex balance. Sitting on a base of wheat & pilsner malts, this hoppy sour offers a bright, layered experience that's both crisp & satisfying.

items.badge_description: Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 95 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 20!

beer.beer_description: Descending upon Earth through flash & thunder from the skies above, the Mighty Titan arrives at the Seven Seas of R(h)ye commanding an offering of Red Rye IPA. Spearheaded by robust flavours of toasted bread, dried fruit & cola, elements of spice & citrus compliment the beautiful red hue of Mighty Titan!

Descending upon Earth through flash & thunder from the skies above, the Mighty Titan arrives at the Seven Seas of R(h)ye commanding an offering of Red Rye IPA. Spearheaded by robust flavours of toasted bread, dried fruit & cola, elements of spice & citrus compliment the beautiful red hue of Mighty Titan!

Bongo, our beloved no-frills ex-van, inspired this beer - a tribute to its straightforward reliability. This brew, like Bongo, offering a no-nonsense, thirst-quenching experience without the bells and whistles of modern, fancy concoctions. It's the equivalent of a cool breeze on a hot day, capturing the essence of simplicity in a world of extravagant brews.

Bongo, our beloved no-frills ex-van, inspired this beer - a tribute to its straightforward reliability. This brew, like Bongo, offering a no-nonsense, thirst-quenching experience without the bells and whistles of modern, fancy concoctions. It's the equivalent of a cool breeze on a hot day, capturing the essence of simplicity in a world of extravagant brews.

Dive into the velvety depths of Across The Universe Stout, where each sip unveils layers of biscuity maltiness intertwined with extravagant notes of dark chocolate & nutty richness. Its creamy mouthfeel coats the palate with indulgent richness, inviting you to savour each moment. With every sip, experience a harmonious blend of decadence & satisfaction that transcends the ordinary.

items.badge_description:
Thank you for celebrating International Stout Day by savoring a delicious stout! Stout enthusiasts like you know that there's a world of flavor waiting to be explored within the stout family, from classic dry stouts to rich barrel-aged stouts, and everything in between. Here's a toast to the deep, complex, and delightful world of stouts!

Keep exploring the rich, roasted flavors and aromatic notes that stouts have to offer, and earn other great stout badges like Beyond a Shadow of a Stout, Heavy Weight, Dessert Time! and more.

beer.beer_description: Say it once, say it twice, third time’s the charm! This Beetlejuice Italian Pilsner will make you feel strange and unusual with its crisp Saphir & Tettnang hops. Floral aromas and a hint of spice bring this beautifully undead brew to life. Crushable, refreshing, and perfect for any showtime moment – just don’t get too comfortable, because it’ll disappear before you know it!

Dive into the velvety depths of Across The Universe Stout, where each sip unveils layers of biscuity maltiness intertwined with extravagant notes of dark chocolate & nutty richness. Its creamy mouthfeel coats the palate with indulgent richness, inviting you to savour each moment. With every sip, experience a harmonious blend of decadence & satisfaction that transcends the ordinary.

With every sip, experience a harmonious blend of decadence & satisfaction that transcends the ordinary.

Thank you for celebrating International Stout Day by savoring a delicious stout! Stout enthusiasts like you know that there's a world of flavor waiting to be explored within the stout family, from classic dry stouts to rich barrel-aged stouts, and everything in between. Here's a toast to the deep, complex, and delightful world of stouts!

Keep exploring the rich, roasted flavors and aromatic notes that stouts have to offer, and earn other great stout badges like Beyond a Shadow of a Stout, Heavy Weight, Dessert Time! and more.

beer.beer_description:
Shapeshifter Tamarillo Saison has a light body that offers a delightful balance of flavours. 
Aromas of spice & clove from the Belgian yeast paired with notes of umami & citric bite from the tamarillo are layered over a wheat & spelt malt base for a unique & satisfying experience.

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 305 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 62!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 340 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 69!

beer.beer_description: Our Munich Helles is crisp with subtle toastiness & pronounced malt aromas, offering a smooth & incredibly drinkable experience. Its layered complexity adds depth to each sip, perfectly balancing malt richness with a refreshing finish. Clean & satisfying, it's a lager that leaves a lasting impression.

items.badge_description: So, you're new around here? Congrats on your first brew! This one's for you.

beer.beer_name: White Star Jasmine Green Tea Kolsch
beer.beer_description: An outstanding collaboration with Altitude Brewing resulted in White Star, a steeped jasmine green tea kolsch. Cold conditioning provides this hybrid style a crisp & clean platform for the green tea & lemon drop to express themselves while the jasmine floral notes are prominent on the nose!

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 430 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.

beer.beer_description: A classic IPA named after head brewer Ash's spirit animal, Snow Leopard brings a balanced hop trio of Centennial, Citra and Strata. Strong grapefruit and citrus flavours are paired with light floral notes and a crisp bitterness!

items.comment: Ooh, yes. I like this beer. It’s strong and smooth.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 70 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 15!

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 240 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 49.

beer.beer_description: Eyes are the windows to the soul & at the soul of this session hazy IPA is a balanced combination of Simcoe, Mosaic & Sultana Cryo hops! Notes of pineapple, tropical fruit & pine make this one black cat you won't mind crossing!

A classic IPA named after head brewer Ash's spirit animal, Snow Leopard brings a balanced hop trio of Centennial, Citra and Strata. Strong grapefruit and citrus flavours are paired with light floral notes and a crisp bitterness!
A dry WCIPA w/ a light malt profile featuring Simcoe, Mosaic & Azacca hops. Citrus. Aromatic. Ripe Pineapple.

Over time, Wolfii has evolved into Wulfenite forming a well-balanced APA that showcases a beautiful orange-red colour worthy of the rare gem's namesake. Full of El Dorado, Simcoe & Centennial hops that bring notes of pineapple with a nice bitterness & pine mouthfeel all coming to rest on an approachable malt base.

A brand new shimmering tropical XPA. With the summer months comes the promise of sunshine & warmth, & with the insane amount of Galaxy, Citra, Simcoe, & Mosaic hops, that's exactly what Luster is. Close your eyes, take a sip & let it taste like you're on summer holiday.

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: The Gryphon: our guardian of treasures - fresh Nelson Sauvin hops. A majestic hazy at 8.3% w/ upfront passionfruit aroma & lingering tropical notes.

Big, bitter, beautiful. A throwback to the truly bitter old school West Coast IPAs of the ‘00s. Classic US 'C' hops along with their good mate Simcoe, giving this IPA a zesty, piney aroma, while a hint of crystal malts ensure enough backbone to support the bitter bite.

A classic Heyday APA made w/ help from the Moon 1 crew! The star of the show is a combined whirlpool & dry hop of Mosaic & Centennial hops for robust lemon, floral & citrus notes. Balanced perfectly by pleasant bitterness from Hallertau Magnum & a touch of toffee malt for a satisfying finish.

Underwater Forest is a peated kelp stout brewed in collaboration with Southward Distilling & AgriSea. Ecklonia kelp that's typically used for their Wave gin balances out the dark chocolate & peat smoke while adding savoury characteristics!
As big as a sasquatch and as bitter as one who's been left high & dry, this is a throwback to the old-school West Coast IPAs. A clean, hop-forward malt base allows the three US-C hops to shine!

Mind Cat's influence on Heyday is on full display with this hazy IPA brimming with Motueka, Citra & Idaho 7 hops. While Mind Cat wields more of a spoon than a scepter, this brew still comes to life at 6.2%

Glow is a big East Coast IPA w/ Galaxy, Centennial, Mosaic, Nelson Sauvin & Simcoe. A medium to firm bitterness is balanced w/ notes of tropical fruit, citrus & pine that allow this hop holy grail to almost glow in the glass!

beer.beer_name: Double Troubling Spiced Navel Orange Farmhouse Ale
beer.beer_description: A fantastic Trans-Tasman collaboration with our mates at Sailors Grave Brewing resulted in Double Troubling, a spiced navel orange farmhouse ale. A light addition of Motueka hops pairs lime with orange citrus to accompany the spices & Saison yeast characteristics.

Jeremiah was a bullfrog. Was a good friend of mine. I never understood a single word he said. But I helped him a-drink his pint. A classic NZ-hopped imperial pilsner with an aromatic dry hop from heavyweights Riwaka & Motueka & a touch of Nelson Sauvin, Jeremiah brings a refreshing balance of citrus lime & subtle passionfruit notes

A super cloudy completely unfiltered New School IPA with 12% oats and 5% wheat. Brewed with White Labs 008 yeast to accentuate the 12 grams per litre of Simcoe and Citra hop character. Low bitterness and high drinkability.
Dynasty is a juicy, crisp and tart beverage. The yuzu and Citra dry hop join forces to create a beautiful explosion of refreshing citrus notes.

Phase Wave is the final beer in our Hazy Wave series. With the soft, billowy mouthfeel & body we love.  Ekuanot, Simcoe & Citra hops, with a big splash of Centennial hop oil. They bring that huge tropical hop thunder crashing down on your palate like a tsunami.

Back from their trip around the galaxy, Time Cat returns w/ another hazy brew. 
This time w/ Galaxy, Citra. Amarillo & Simcoe hops, giving you a blast of citrus & fruity aromas & notes, landing at 5.8%.

Brewed to pair perfectly with our Wellington on a Plate Lamb Burger  by combining the burgers' berries with a milkshake IPA. Space Jam is ultimately a NEIPA with twice the usual amount of lactose. With a huge amount of raspberries, black berries, black currants and a double dry hopping of mosaic. Predictably juicy and lush with a huge rich mouthfeel and complex aroma.

Swift NEIPA wastes no time in getting to the point. Motueka, and Citra hops dominate, which brings forward characteristics of crushed citrus lime, tropical fruit and lemon zest. Named after one of the fastest birds in level flight, this NEIPA is Swift(ly) becoming the best one yet!

Our 2018 Winter Ales Festival beer was inspired by dipping a salted caramel cookie in the foam of a cappuccino. A collaboration with Emporio, our local neighbourhood coffee roaster. With 5kg's of Guatemalan light roast espresso roast beans and Marlborough sea salt. The caramel notes come from the dark crystal malts, as well as the lactose for a sweet creamy finish. This beer is not vegan, and does contain caffeine.

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: In the craft industry, doing something hazy to it. Doin’ it better than anybody you ever seen do it. A fruity hoppy hazy got a nice ring to it. I guess every hazy cat gonna need his theme music. No one hop can have all that POWER. The hops dropping, I just count the hours. Start sipping, you’re sipping on the POWER. (21st Century Power Cat Can)
A blonde ale base intensely dry hopped with Citra and conditioned on apricots.

An ode to summer & the American IPA, Sun Belt is a full bodied grapefruit IPA w/ Cascade & Mandarina Bavaria bringing out a citrusy, approachable bitterness. Citra then combines w/ fresh grapefruit zest & juice to throw it right over the edge!

Hazy, juicy & bursting w/ intense flavours & aromas of mango, pineapple & tropical citrus notes, this beer will take your palate on a trip around the galaxy! Coincidentally featuring Galaxy, Mosaic, Centennial & Nelson Sauvin hops.
